messages.title: Labour plan cuts to Freedom Pass
messages.content: Labour's London Mayor has drafted plans to cut the Freedom Pass.

messages.title: Labour's last 13 years
messages.content: 13 years of Labour Government have let this area down.

messages.title: Convince Want Wasted
messages.content: Labour's Building Schools for the Future funding has been wasted.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats will target extra funding to reduce class sizes, tailored help with children who are falling behind, and better pay for the best teachers.
Liberal Democrats propose investing in green technology to create jobs and help Britain become a world leader in it.
Liberal Democrats pledge to cut waste in public services, to devote funds to schools, hospitals, and police.

issues.economy: Liberal Democrats will shape the economy to be fair, where those who prosper pay their share to support vital services.
issues.education: Labour's Building Schools for the Future funding has been wasted. Smaller class sizes and better support for children are proposed.
issues.environment: Liberal Democrats will invest in green technology.
issues.governance: Liberal Democrats pledge to give the local people the right to sack corrupt MPs.

housing.content: Better city planning is needed to protect the environment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will work tirelessly on the issues that matter to you.

politicalExperience.achievements: A track record of action. Campaigned for fairer hospital parking charges.
